name: 🐻 💉 👻
description:
Intended as an entry for Game Den Quick 22, but got delayed.

Capture the ghosts, collect the items they stole, bring the items back to the bin.

In-game controls:

  • R to restart 
  • A and D to move 
  • W or Space to jump 
  • E to pick up items 
  • Left Click to suck a ghost in
  • Right Click to spit out a ghost

Credits:

jukmifgguggh - Menu Music

SnubbishShrub - In-game Music
